statements: DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE company_name = 'Example Company';
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE company_name = 'Apple Inc' AND date = '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE profit > 10000 AND revenue < 5000000;
DELETE FROM FinancialData WHERE id = 100 AND profit > 5000;
DELETE FROM GrowthMetrics WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND user_growth < 1000;
DELETE FROM growth_trends WHERE trend_id IN (1, 2, 3)
DELETE FROM historical_financial_data WHERE date = '2021-01-15' AND expenses > 5000
DELETE FROM revenue_forecast WHERE confidence_level < 0.7 AND date = '2022-03-20'
